[Gra17]R.G. Grainger. Some useful formulae for aerosol size distributions and optical properties. Published Online: Grainger web., june 2017. URL: http://eodg.atm.ox.ac.uk/user/grainger/research/aerosols.pdf.

[Zen02]Charlie Zender. Particle size distributions:theory and application to aerosols, clouds, and soils. Published Online at patarnott.com, nov 2002. URL: https://patarnott.com/pdf/SizeDistributions.pdf.
